description: This file contains validation logic for device data, including JSON schema definition, custom IPv4 validation, and utility functions for ObjectId conversion and document serialization in a MongoDB context.

methods.name: validate_device_payload
methods.description: Validates a device payload against the JSON schema, supporting partial updates.

methods.name: to_object_id
methods.description: Converts a string to a MongoDB ObjectId, raising an error if invalid.

methods.name: serialize_device
methods.description: Serializes a MongoDB document to a JSON-compatible dict, converting ObjectId and datetime fields.
